front.title: INTERNET MESSAGE ACCESS PROTOCOL - THREAD EXTENSION

abstract.t: This document describes the server-based threading extension to theIMAP4rev1 protocol. This extension provides substantial performanceimprovements for IMAP clients which offer threaded views.A server which supports this extension indicates this with more ormore capability names consisting of 'THREAD-' followed by a supportedthreading algorithm name as described in this document. Thisprovides for future upwards-compatible extensions.
